flow.header: Follow our guide to pair your LinkedIn account with the the 2FAS app.

menu.title: Please select the method you use to open LinkedIn now

steps.content: Go to **www.linkedin.com** and log into your account.
Click your avatar in the top bar and select **Settings & Privacy**. From the left-hand menu, select **Sign in & security**.
Then select the **Two-step verification** section on the right and click **Set up**.
You may be asked to verify your account by entering a 6-digit code sent to your email.

Select the **Authenticator App** and click **Continue**.

You may be asked to enter a password for security reasons. Enter your password and click **Continue**.
Use **Add manually** option below to add LinkedIn to your 2FAS app and rewrite the secret key from LinkedIn. Click **Continue** on LinkedIn, retype generated token, and tap **Verify**.
Open **LinkedIn**, tap the avatar on the top left corner, then open **Settings**.
Tap **Sign in & security**. Then select the **Two-step verification** and tap **Set up**.
You may be asked to verify your account by entering a 6-digit code sent to your email.

Choose the **Authentication app** and tap **Continue**.

You ay be asked to enter a password for security reasons. Enter your password and click **Continue**.
Copy secret key and use **Add manually** option below to add LinkedIn to your 2FAS app. Tap **Continue** on LinkedIn, retype generated token, and tap **Verify**.
